Comment.Text: Investigate covers until all has been invalidated

Exit State: Failure - Investigate found something InvestigationTime: How long time are we investigating for? InvestigationRadius: We will only investigate covers in this radius around the last known position of the target MaxInvestigators: How many AI can investigate at the same time. MaxInvestigationHeightDiff: We are not intereted in investigating covers above or below this height in meters
No token: Animate in place until investigation ended

Variable.Value: Investigate: Friend entity does not have a target anymore
